HomePage.cardDescription: Deploy your new project in one-click.

LoggedInButton.alertDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to logout ?

PricingSection.titleCard: Find a plan that fits your goals
PricingSection.descriptionCard: Choose the plan that best meets your needs and goals. We have a solution tailored for you.

PricingCompare.titleDescription: Choose the plan that's right for you

PricingModify.title: modify your subscription
PricingModify.description: Manage your subscription easily using the options below.
PricingModify.descriptionCard: You can upgrade your plan to access more features by clicking "Upgrade", or choose to change your current plan information, such as canceling your subscription or updating your payment information.

PricingUpgrade.title: Upgrade your subscription
PricingUpgrade.description: Update your subscription easily using the options below.

question.subscriptionQuestion: How do i cancel my subscription ?

response.subscriptionResponse: You may cancel your subscription at any time in your payment settings. When you cancel, your subscription ends at the end of the current billing cycle.

SuccessPaymentPage.cardDescription: You are now a premium member
